scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && rm -rf ../dist/index.html
scripts.build:server: cd server && cp -R .htaccess config.ini index.php services templates vendor ../dist
scripts.init:1: mv _/husky .husky && git init && npm pkg set scripts.prepare="husky install"
scripts.init:2: mv _/client client && mv client/eslintrc.txt client/.eslintrc.cjs && mv client/gitignore.txt client/.gitignore && mv client/prettierrc.json client/.prettierrc.json
scripts.init:6: cd server && ../composer.phar require slim/slim slim/psr7 php-di/slim-bridge middlewares/trailing-slash slim/twig-view zguillez/z-database && ../composer.phar install
scripts.serve: npm run build && cd dist && php -S localhost:8080
scripts.test:2: cd client && npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.test:3: cd client && npm run test:unit -- run
scripts.update:client: cd client && npm-check-updates -u && sort-package-json && npm i && cd ../
